EmailTemplate.description: Back Order Notification to the user
EmailTemplate.name: FS Back Order Notification to the user
EmailTemplate.subject: Back Order Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!OrderApi__Sales_Order_Line__c.OrderApi__Contact__c},
Please be informed that the item ({!OrderApi__Sales_Order_Line__c.OrderApi__Item__c}) you had purchased is back ordered. Regards NYSBA
